Title: Rebels in the sands of patriarchy
Content: Can a family centric and promiscuity-filled narrative wrapped in the form of a fairly large individual story pick up the holes in backdrop of the ongoing tussle between patriarchy and matriarchy? Does
Author: Shafey Kidwai
